clean_data: SQL Server Database Administrator SQL Server span lDatabasespan span lAdministratorspan SQL Server Database Administrator Mahamittra Group LLC Atlanta GA Work Experience SQL Server Database Administrator Mahamittra Group LLC March 2018 to Present Identifies database requirements by interviewing customers analyzing department applications programming and operations evaluating existing systems and designing proposed systems while working in a team of 6 Recommends solutions by defining database physical structure and functional capabilities database security data backup and recovery specifications Installs revised or new systems by proposing specifications and flowcharts recommending optimum access techniques coordinating installation requirements Maintains database performance by calculating optimum values for database parameters implementing new releases completing maintenance requirements evaluating computer operating systems and hardware products Prepares users by conducting training providing information resolving problems Provides information by answering questions and requests Maintains quality service by establishing and enforcing organization standards Support high availability using AlwaysON availability groups for our critical production databases SQL DBA ADMINISTRATOR Ellucian January 2016 to March 2018 SQL DBA ADMINISTRATOR Transdin Group LLC January 2014 to January 2016 Ensure all database servers were backed Test backups to prevent down time Troubleshoot SQL Server service outages as they occur Use clustering log shipping mirroring Installed and configure new SQL Servers When performance issues arise determine the most effective way to increase performance including hardware purchases server configuration changes or indexquery changes Document the companys database environment Education Certification in Microsoft SQL Chattahoochee Technical College Marietta GA 2008 to 2012 Skills DBA Sql Dba Sql Server MYSQL Ssis Sql Database DB2
